headline: Schwab’s SCHD ETF Is Mostly Solid, But 1 Top Holding Is Concerning
summary: The Schwab U.S. Dividend Equity ETF (NYSEARCA:SCHD) is a popular income choice for retirees. headline: How Analysts See the Pepsi Story Shifting Amid Mixed Views on Growth and Valuation
summary: PepsiCo stock's fair value estimate has inched higher from about $152.57 to roughly $154.41 per share, even as the discount rate ticks up from around 6.78% to approximately 6.96%. This reflects a more cautious return backdrop. This nuanced shift mirrors a mixed Wall Street narrative, where modestly stronger long term revenue growth expectations of roughly 3.61% annually support a slightly higher target, even as analysts temper enthusiasm around near term fundamentals. Stay tuned to see how...

headline: PepsiCo revamp: What to expect from the activist investor deal
summary: PepsiCo (PEP) agreed to lower prices and cut costs in a deal with activist investor Elliott Management. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Ines Ferré, Siebert Financial chief investment officer Mark Malek, and Principal Asset Management chief global strategist Seema Shah join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss the deal and what it signals about the broader consumer staples sector (XLP). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: PepsiCo Plans Layoffs as It Looks to Wrap Up Elliott Talks
summary: The moves represent an early agreement with Elliott as the maker of Mountain Dew and Doritos seeks to recapture growth and win back investors.  Elliott built up a roughly $4 billion stake earlier this year and clamored for changes, citing an overly complex portfolio of brands and a declining share of the beverage business.  PepsiCo shares were little changed in extended trading.
